chapter.title: Advanced Desktop Configuration
chapter.para: Ovaj dio pomoći će vam u korištenju i uređivanju Ubuntu radnog okružja (zvanog GNOME) i upravitelja datotekama (zvanog Nautilus).

sect1.title: Log in automatically when the computer starts
sect1.para: To log in automatically when the computer starts:

step.para: Choose &login-screen-setup;.
Select Security, and turn on Enable Automatic Login.
Choose the account you want to log in as.

sect1.para: This is not recommended for most computers, as it is not secure and may give other people access to your information.

sect1.title: Otvori datoteke s administratorskim ovlastima iz preglednika datoteka
sect1.para: To open files with administrative privileges from the file manager, you need to add a script to Nautilus.

warning.para: Opening files with administrative privileges is a security risk. Always ensure that you are familiar with the file that you are opening.

step.para: Otvorite novu datoteku za uređivanje u relevantnom direktoriju: gedit $HOME/.gnome2/nautilus-scripts/Otvori\ kao\ administrator
Enter these lines in the new file:
step.programlisting: for uri in $NAUTILUS_SCRIPT_SELECTED_URIS; do gksudo "gnome-open $uri" & done

step.para: Save the edited file (an example)
Učinite spremljenu datoteku izvršnom: chmod +x $HOME/.gnome2/nautilus-scripts/Otvori\ kao\ administrator

sect1.para: You can now open a file as an administrator by right-clicking on it and choosing Scripts Open as Administrator .

sect1.title: Instalirati dodatna pisma
sect1.para: Ovo područje opisuje kako instalirati dodatna pisma (fontove) iz Ubuntu arhiva.
For international fonts, install these packages from the Universe repository (see ):
For Microsoft TrueType core fonts, install the msttcorefonts package from the Multiverse repository (see ).
Za Ghostscript pisma, instalirajte gsfonts-x11 paket (pogledajte ).
After installing any new font, rebuild the font information files by entering in a Terminal:

If you prefer to download individual fonts by hand, you can install them simply and easily by opening a file manager, and typing fonts:/// into the location bar (see the file manager manual for how to use the location bar). Then you can simply drag the font you downloaded into the group of existing fonts.

step.para: Install the rar package from the Multiverse repository (see ).
Pokrenite: sudo ln -fs /usr/bin/rar /usr/bin/unrar
Kako biste otvorili rar datoteku, kliknite dva puta na nju.

sect1.title: Napredni appleti radnog okružja
sect1.para: gDesklets je sustav koji pokreće male programe (desklets), kao što su prognoza vremena, informacije o sustavu, kontrolu glazbe itd., na vašem radnom okržuju, kombinirajući korisnost i lijep izgled.

step.para: Install the gdesklets and gdesklets-data packages from the Universe repository (see ).

Choose:
Applications Accessories gDesklets
Za više informacija, posjetite gDesklets stranicu

sect1.title: Pokaži Računalo, Početni direktorij i Smeće ikone u GNOME-u

step.para: Open the Configuration Editor, by running the program gconf-editor (see the run application manual for help on how to run an application without using the menu).

Choose
apps nautilus desktop .
Turn on computer_icon_visible, home_icon_visible, and trash_icon_visible. The changes take effect immediately.

sect1.title: Ponovo pokreni GNOME bez ponovnog pokretanja računala

step.para: Spremite svoje radove i zatvorite sve otvorene programe.

Use the Ctrl Alt Backspace
shortcut keys to restart GNOME.

If Ctrl Alt Backspace
is disabled, type sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
(See to disable Ctrl Alt Backspace .)

sect1.title: Spriječiti ponovno pokretanje X-a Ctrl-Alt-Backspace kombinacijom

step.para: Napravite sigurnosnu kopiju postojeće /etc/X11/xorg.conf datoteke: sudo cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf_backup
Open /etc/X11/xorg.conf for editing: sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf
Dodajte ove linije na kraj datoteke: Section "ServerFlags" Option "DontZap" "yes" EndSection
Save the edited file (an example).
Promjena će nasupiti slijedeći put kada se prijavite u GNOME. Ako želite odmah primjeniti promjene, ponovo pokrenite GNOME ručno. (pogledajte )
